projects.title: Car Reservation
projects.description: This is the app that helps people way to book bus tickets. earch for your destination and choose from a wide choice of reliable bus  operators, departure times, prices, bus types, pickup & drop off points, ratings &  reviews. Choose seats, beds & pay securely using popular payment options: ATM Internet  Banking, Visa

projects.title: Yoteacher
projects.description: Yoteacher is an educational application that connects students and parents who  are looking for answers, homework guides, advice on learning content with  teachers of all subjects: math, physics, chemistry, biology, literature, English,  geography of grades 9, 10, 11, 12. The main functions of Yoteacher include:  â€¢ Search teachers by subject, by location  â€¢ Chat, SMS individually or in groups with teachers  â€¢ Make audio or video calls directly to the teacher  â€¢ Save contacts and make friends with students

projects.title: Tank Battle
projects.description: Tank Battle is a side-scrolling shoot 'em up arcade action game at its best! Use an incredible assortment of heavy artillery to blast away enemy tanks and planes, and fight your way to victory. What are you waiting for? Pull yourself up by your bootstraps and get into the action!
